department.ch: 材料科學與工程研究所碩士班
department.en: Institute of Materials Science and Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程目標為介紹薄膜成長之相關基本物理原理及薄膜成長技術，此外並將嘗試介紹薄膜技術於產業界之應用，除了引導同學對薄膜物理與成長技術有初步的概念外、亦讓同學對其在產業界的應用有所瞭解。
goal.en: Before the completion of this course, each student should be able to:1. Understand and be able to explain the basic concept of thin film growth2. Distinguish between physical and chemical vapor deposition3. Describe the fundamentals of thin film growth technology4. Understand the importance and applications of thin film technology in various fields of industry“

outline.ch:
1. 薄膜成長原理
2. 真空科學基礎
3. 氣相沉積技術
4. 薄膜特性分析
outline.en:
1. Theory of thin film growth
2. Basic knowledge of vacuum science
3. Principles of various deposition techniques
4. Characterization of thin films

textbook.ch: Thin Film Deposition: principles and practice, D. L. Smith (McGraw-Hill)Wiley)“
textbook.en: Thin Film Deposition: principles and practice, D. L. Smith (McGraw-Hill)“
